name: psgnevpm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfv(cevpm, c0))), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), nat1))

stmt.origin: simplbda(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfv(cevpm, c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), nat1), wcel(c1, c4))
stmt.pretty: simplbda(c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈(pmEven ` c0), (c2 ` c1)= 1, c1 ∈ c4)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfv(cevpm, c0))), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), nat1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cevpm, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), nat1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfv(cevpm, c0))), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), nat1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cevpm, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), nat1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cevpm, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), nat1))))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(csymg, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cpsgn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin →(c1 ∈(pmEven ` c0)↔(c1 ∈ c4 ∧(c2 ` c1)= 1)))
⊣ c3 =(SymGrp ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(pmSgn ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfv(cevpm, c0))), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), nat1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(csymg, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cpsgn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈(pmEven ` c0))→(c2 ` c1)= 1)
⊣ c3 =(SymGrp ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(pmSgn ` c0)

comment: A permutation which is even has sign 1. (Contributed by SO, 9-Jul-2018.)
